Action.author: denyeart
Action.body: ~scottz Do you want to update FixVersion to be v1.4.0.

Action.author: scottz
Action.body: It is used to create an independent image for Testviewer, but it should probably be kept in sync with the data generated. We will cut our fabric-test 1.3 branch after fabric does, so we still have time to do this. Since it is first real release, we could probably get away with surfing to 1.4 and just tell everyone to retrieve latest image, but let's see if we can get it done.

Action.author: scottz
Action.body: We are not using, and will not use this longterm, so this can be closed.
